text: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.
Don’t be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.
Opportunities don’t happen. You create them.
Invest in yourself. Your career is the engine of your wealth.
The goal of a successful investor is to make the best decision possible with the information available.
Wealth consists not in having great possessions, but in having few wants.
Time in the market beats timing the market.
A budget is telling your money where to go instead of wondering where it went.
The stock market is filled with individuals who know the price of everything but the value of nothing.
Financial freedom is available to those who learn about it and work for it.
Do not wait to strike till the iron is hot, but make it hot by striking.
Innovation distinguishes between a leader and a follower.
Business opportunities are like buses; there’s always another one coming.
The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
An investment in knowledge pays the best interest.
The four most dangerous words in investing are: 'This time it’s different.'
Your net worth to the world is usually determined by what remains after your bad habits are subtracted from your good ones.
If you really look closely, most overnight successes took a long time.
Earn with integrity, spend with purpose, and invest for the future.
Successful investing is about managing risk, not avoiding it.
Chase the vision, not the money; the money will end up following you.
Don’t put all your eggs in one basket.
Compound interest is the eighth wonder of the world. He who understands it, earns it.
The more you learn, the more you earn.
Risk comes from not knowing what you’re doing.
Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success.
You only have to do a few things right in your life so long as you don’t do too many things wrong.
The stock market is a device for transferring money from the impatient to the patient.
The secret of success is to do the common thing uncommonly well.
Formal education will make you a living; self-education will make you a fortune.
A man who does not plan long ahead will find trouble at his door.
The best investment you can make is in yourself.
The purpose of a business is to create and keep a customer.
Price is what you pay. Value is what you get.
Persistence overshadows even talent as the most valuable resource shaping the quality of life.
Financial fitness is not a pipe dream or a state of mind. It’s a reality if you are willing to pursue it and embrace it.
Be fearful when others are greedy. Be greedy when others are fearful.
Beware the investment activity that produces applause; the great moves are usually greeted by yawns.
Every adversity, every failure, every heartache carries with it the seed of an equal or greater benefit.
A business that makes nothing but money is a poor business.
Frugality includes all the other virtues.
Do not be embarrassed by your failures, learn from them and start again.
Good business leaders create a vision, articulate the vision, passionately own the vision, and relentlessly drive it to completion.
Risk is part of the process. Learn to manage it effectively.
Simplicity is the ultimate sophistication.
Never depend on a single income. Make investments to create a second source.
Planning is bringing the future into the present so that you can do something about it now.
It is not the strongest of the species that survive, nor the most intelligent, but the one most responsive to change.
Winners never quit and quitters never win.
In the middle of difficulty lies opportunity.
Do one thing every day that scares you.
Vision without action is a daydream. Action without vision is a nightmare.
The key is in not spending time, but in investing it.
Great things in business are never done by one person. They're done by a team of people.
Your time is limited, so don’t waste it living someone else’s life.
The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.
Success is not in what you have, but who you are.
Success seems to be connected with action. Successful people keep moving.
Money is a terrible master but an excellent servant.
You miss 100% of the shots you don’t take.
Spend wisely today, so you can invest for tomorrow.
Luck is great, but most of life is hard work.
Invest in as much of yourself as you can. You are your own biggest asset by far.
The best way to predict the future is to create it.
It always seems impossible until it’s done.
Whether you think you can or think you can’t, you’re right.
Strive not to be a success, but rather to be of value.
Opportunities don't happen. You create them.
Money grows on the tree of persistence.
Do what you love, and success will follow.
If you don't find a way to make money while you sleep, you will work until you die.
Motivation is what gets you started. Habit is what keeps you going.
A journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step.
Success is no accident. It is hard work, perseverance, learning, studying, sacrifice, and most of all, love of what you are doing.
Fall seven times and stand up eight.
Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever.
It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
Don’t count the days, make the days count.
Dream big and dare to fail.
The harder you work for something, the greater you’ll feel when you achieve it.
Don’t stop when you’re tired. Stop when you’re done.
Don’t wish it were easier. Wish you were better.
It’s not whether you get knocked down, it’s whether you get up.
A winner is a dreamer who never gives up.
Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.
Don’t be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.
Opportunities don’t happen. You create them.
Invest in yourself. Your career is the engine of your wealth.
The goal of a successful investor is to make the best decision possible with the information available.
Wealth consists not in having great possessions, but in having few wants.
Time in the market beats timing the market.
A budget is telling your money where to go instead of wondering where it went.
The stock market is filled with individuals who know the price of everything but the value of nothing.
Financial freedom is available to those who learn about it and work for it.
Do not wait to strike till the iron is hot, but make it hot by striking.
Innovation distinguishes between a leader and a follower.
Business opportunities are like buses; there’s always another one coming.
The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
An investment in knowledge pays the best interest.
The four most dangerous words in investing are: 'This time it’s different.'
